/opt/rocm-5.4.3/llvm/bin/clang++ -fPIC -shared  -o /home/heinemann/gpuunpacker/cbmroot/build2/lib/libxpu_Hip.so CMakeFiles/xpu_Hip.dir/home/heinemann/gpuunpacker/cbmroot/external/xpu/src/xpu/detail/platform/hip_cuda/cuhip_driver.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm-5.4.3/hip/lib /opt/rocm-5.4.3/hip/lib/libamdhip64.so.5.4.50403 --hip-link --offload-arch=gfx906 --offload-arch=gfx908 /opt/rocm-5.4.3/llvm/lib/clang/15.0.0/lib/linux/libclang_rt.builtins-x86_64.a
